description: Luxury Hotels in Mysore The Quorum, Managed by The Park Hotels, a luxury hotel in Mysore, is located in the heart of the city of palaces. The 59 room contemporary Mysore hotel exudes luxury, sophistication and intimacy. The well-appointed rooms at the hotel come equipped with a range of state-of-the-art technology and amenities to cater the new age traveler for commerce, leisure and relaxation making our Mysore hotel an ideal choice for patrons, guests and travellers whether on business, leisure or a weekend retreat. This hotel in Mysore city, offers various options of International classics to Indian cuisine presented with innovative styles. Dining experience in the CafÃ©, our all hours coffee shop and spending breezy evenings with our sunset in the alfresco bar are a must when you travel Mysore.
address: Quorum, 2257/1, Opposite to D C Office, Near Reliance Trend, Vinobha Road.
